speaker: Na
text: I’m good, thanks. What about you?

speaker: Ty
text: I’m good too. Oh, by the way, I’m Trần Ngọc Tý. What’s your name?

speaker: Na
text: I’m Hà Na, but you can just call me Na.

speaker: Ty
text: That’s a cute name! Nice to meet you.

speaker: Na
text: Thanks, Tý. Nice to meet you, too.

speaker: Ty
text: Well, Na, it’s time for class. See you later!
